content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my patio entertaining company. i noticed a bright orange light to my left. i thought is was a plane but there were no blinking lights and it was too high up. i thought it may be a firework but it continued to travel over the city of mayfield hts. i began to think it was a space station but it suddenly stopped and remained still for 15 secs & then began blinking erratically changing from orange to a white and acsended. forth.
content.summary: Orange light

content.detailedDescription:
The dog woke me at about 1 am needing to go out.  i put her out and saw a large, "blob" of light in the sky, much, much bigger than stars or satellites.  i went to another part of the house and got binoculars.  when i returned the light was much smaller, closer to the size of a star.  i trained the binoculars on it and saw an object with a horizontal, oval shape that had i believe five lights, adjacant in a horizontal line,the center one i believe was red.  all of the lights were pulsating and sent spikes of light up and down.  i woke my husband but when he got to the window, the object was gone.  as he went back to the bedroom, i again spotted a moving light and trained my binoculars on it.  it was the same object i had just observed.  i saw it very briefly again and then it disappeared.  i really don't know what i was looking at.  the object appeared to move left to right, from the large "blob" to the smaller sized light.  then it moved away in a northerly direction.  

i remain perplexed by the incident.  i keep replaying it in my head, but have not yet figured out what it might have been.
content.summary: Shortly after 1 am let dog out and saw a stationary "blob" in sky.  got binoculars, much smaller, could see horizontal oval shape with minimum five lights, pulsating, i believe center light was red.  lights sent spiking beams.  don't know what it was!

content.detailedDescription: "r" my girlfriend came out of guest house looked up saw it. ran to my house got me! i looked up! took few sec. to register! it was fiery red orb! looked like asteroid but no smoke behind it! flew horizontal slowed down shot straight up! hovered min. then shot thru cloud cover! disappeared! i have never seen one! didn't think i ever would! few friends saw it! plus whole street party ! fire in sky! not saying aliens! just unidentified!!
content.summary: It was red fiery bigger than p. heli.  never seen anything like it! sober! cruising speed! ascended! hovered min.

content.detailedDescription: It was about between 10pm and 11pm i cannot remember what exact time it was. i was inside on my couch holding my new grandchild.  my son in law came rushing in after walking the dog and rushed me and my daughter outside.  there were only two lights left after i went outside they were very high up.  when the lightening struck you could see some of them in the clouds.  very odd lightning as well as there was no sound.  my son in law said that they changed into different flight patterns but it was in seconds, nothing a plane or balloon could do.  apparently other people were watching them as well.  i only saw the two pulsate and then blink out. they were completely stationary when i went out.  my daughter saw a neon green one a few months earlier but it was in cloud cover as well. i will keep an eye to the sky from now on. i was not much of a believer but i am starting to wonder.  from my research they have been in this area a few times but residence were told they were weather balloons with lights attached to them. i believe if more people were outside sky watching every night instead of watching tv (like me, lol) there would be tons of reports.  p.S. i didn't have time to get my camera and i am not sure if i could have captured a picture as they were very high in the night sky.
content.summary: 20 to 30 amber lights moving in several patterns. then blinked out one by one.  there was a lightning (no thunder) and people were lighting off fireworks

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching july 4th fireworks (2013) from my window.  it was approximately 10:15 - 10:30 pm.  the fireworks were directly east of me and probably no more than about two miles away.  i noticed one red, glowing orb start to ascend to the left of the fireworks.  its size and brightness caught my eye and, at first, i thought it was the finally firecracker being launched (again, because it was so big, i assumed they were going to have a big finish).  the orb appeared (from my perspective) just a bit over the horizon but still very low.  instead of bursting into a firecracker shape, it continued to slowly rise.  it kept climbing then hovered for about five seconds, then re-started its climb while curving a little to my left (its right).  it kept going until it climb as high as i could see (about as high as a plane would be if you watched it after it took off from an airport and it reached its maximum ascent) then it stopped.  then a second red, glowing orb appeared in the same spot as the first one did before it started to climb, and it too started to ascend.  almost immediately, a third, then a fourth appeared (there may have been a fifth one also).  these rose together (slowly like the first one) but very soon after the last one launched, they formed what looked like a parallelagram.  they pretty much followed the same path as the first orb including hovering where it did, then upon their continued climb, curved to my left.  this group kept climbing until it almost reached the first orb, then all of them dimmed and eventually, disappeared.  it wasn't a cloudy night so i don't know if their dimming and disappearance was do to their lights just dimming or because they moved directly away from me making them disappear as they got farther way.

throughout the sighting, i was pretty fascinated by what i was observing.  i also quickly realized, this was not part of the show.  since i had no idea what they were, they qualified as ufos but i, obviously, didn't know if they were military or alien or whatever.  i also was thinking at the time, if these orbs were military or alien, why would they make such an obvious appearance at a fourth of july fireworks display when they had to know a lot of people would be able to see them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed 4-5 red, glowing orbs while watching july 4th fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: Knew they'd be around after seeing some on the 1st and 2nd, around 9:45 took shootnshare and camera out as soon as i went out saw 4 hovering around fire works as i was watching saw airplane it had blinking light and heard the noise. after 3 to 5 minutes the four dissapeared but from the south east saw two more heading nw continued to see two coming from the se heading nw every few minutes about 12 in all also 2 from the south heading north (trying to download from shootnshare but having problems with it)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 hovering around fire works

content.detailedDescription:
Acsending stream of red lights - maybe 20 or more - not aircraft - not fireworks.

riding scooter home in cromwell headed west on high hill.  i saw red lights on the horizon due south ascending in an arc as if each was following the other.  they ascended and then disapeared slowly.  they could have been coast gaurd flares sent from long island sound (guess).   another observer stopped and watched too.  the whole thing lasted about 2 minutes.
content.summary: Acsending stream of red lights - maybe 20 or more - not aircraft - not fireworks

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down to brooklyn from upstate ny on july 6 2013. when the night sky became illuminated with may lights, over 25 of them hovering around in many colors. one of the many began omitting unbelievable light beams that sequentially flashed miles across the night sky. almost like a message of some kind.
may be on of the biggest invasions of all time. 25+ ships
projecting a light show miles across the sky.
content.summary: Enormus fleet of ships hovering in night sky and beaming a large sequential light pattern miles across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on a deck enjoying the dusk with six adults. one of the adults said look. when i looked up i observed a brightly glowing yellow orange oblong object moving extremely fast across the horizon with absolutely no associated noise. we all agreed that nothing we knew of could fly that fast. no flashing lights were observed as you would expect with an airplane. when it was past our vision on the deck we all raced to the other side of the house and observed it make a sweeping turn and then it was out of our vision blocked by homes and trees and the horizon. the object moved from the north west to the east before making the sweeping turn to the south east. the only unusual thing that happened around this time was a forest fire had started the day before in the area and when we first saw the object it was coming from the direction of the fire. i thought it moved like satellite's i have seen before, but this was much closer and it was early dusk much to light to see a satellite.
content.summary: Glowingbrightly yellow orange, oblong, silent very fast changed course

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south on hwy 747 .I just passed mt olive church i noticed an extremely glowing orange object in the sky (southward direction).The object apperaed as a golfball size (it was near cloud level).I pulled over briefly to observe it ,then prceeded south i then lost visual contact (due to trees, hill etc..) i didnt give it much thought .I then left the store then proceede back home on co rd 747 once i got on level road i noticed the glowing object stationary -- in line -- with co rd 747  (at cloud level) . i stopped in the road and observed a pickup truck stopped facing me in the opposite lane ,it appeared they had there head out the window looking up (they wasnt turning ).I opened my sunroof and tried to take a pic, as i was doing this a second orange glowing "ball" appeared near the original one .I just took the first pic trying to zoom in and was saving it to my phone when the 2nd object appeared .I tried to quickly take another but the object(s) went away as quickly as the second one appeared .(just as quick as a light switch ..Poof..)..I dont know for sure what these was but i can for sure rule out man made lights,helecopters ,planes,blimps,birds....I guess you get my drift..Lol..I have no delusiions of ufo's and im not a constant watcher for suchand  i dont  let this topic have any bearing on my life .I just thought that someone would like to know what i saw..
content.summary: Glowing orange balls

content.detailedDescription: Was taking the dogs out for their last run and business for the evening.  i live in the country and look at the sky alot in the evening, love watching the stars, satellites and misc other objects in the sky.  i was leaning over the side of the deck and looking at polaris which is right out my front door and to the side i seen 2 light flashes, i was tired and so i squinted my eyes and asked my self what was that, i reached into the house and grabbed my night vision goggles and looked in the area again, there were 2 stars side by side going east, and to my delight i seen another flash bigger this time and a larger star.  i was still looking at the other ones along with the new one and they suddenly changed direction 90 deg one went due north and the other south, the one that was a little larger because i guess was closer to me started going west, then the funniest thing occured it started doing circles/cartwheels like it was just playing in space lol i thought wow thank you for the giggle, and it straighten out and went west and fast.  i see them all the time one had 2 ever made me laugh by what they were doing.  thank you for letting me share.  i turned this in before on my nook where i have a mufon app but i guess it didn't take.
content.summary: Flashes and then start like orbs showed up

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in yard with friend,smoking cigars.Neighbors where shooting fireworks left over from the fourth of july.I was looking for the display,when i see the ufo,friend see's it also.I live 3 miles from atlantic,and ufo appeared to be a short distance off shore.At first i said, what the hell is that? living on the space coast for over 30 years,i've seen a lot of rocket activity.This looked like a three engined rocket returning to the cape.Flew horizontal with a slight decent went behind tree line,shape looked like 3 flames solid orange in triangular position moving northwest,did not flicker,silent.Glad i saw it.Pete
content.summary: Looked like 3 flame shapes,triangular,600mph,3000ft,agl headind towards ksc.Silent.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting on my deck chatting.  we live 500 feet from the edge of the pacific ocean  it was an overcast night, no stars in the sky and very dark. it was easy that we both noticed a very bright light (gold in color)in a south/southwest direction from our point of view.  as we are both associated with the aeronautical business we knew immediately it was not a commercial aircraft.  the light was extremely bright and after several seconds over viewing it, a second light of the same color appeared to the right of it.  the two lights appeared to come closer to our location but it would stop and hover.  there was no sound.  the two lights then turned into a row of several angled lights (4-6).  it appeared to us the object was banking and flying in a direction of higher altitude.  it was soundless and the lights began blinking until it simply went dark.  we both took 3/5 pictures with our cell phones.
content.summary: July 5th, 2013 ufo - dana point, california

content.detailedDescription: The entire family was out watching fireworks from our back yard and a few minutes into the fireworks my father-in-law and i saw a strange, glowing object moving quit quickly in the sky. i then pointed it out to my husband who also witnessed the event. the object was dark orange in color and did not blink. the shape was either sphere or oval, i could not be certain.  it seemed to be coming from the south and heading north along the mississippi river. the event lasted about a minute and then went out of our sight. it seemed to cover a lot of airspace in a short amount of time. i would be very interested to see if anyone else in or around the muscatine, iowa area saw this object as well.
content.summary: Dark orange, round object moving quickly & silently through the sky

content.detailedDescription:
This was the very first time i witnessed an unidentified flying object. no idea what it was for certain but i am assuming it was likely a scout vehicle or possibly a controlled object that collects data of sorts, it was not large enough to be a main ufo craft. no idea what was piloting this object. 

it caught my eye because it was bright. it must have been following the roofline of my house which has a high pitch and straightened out after it passed my eavestrough then continued slowly in what appeared to be a straight line . my husband did not notice the object as it passed right above him because he was bent down picking up tools or still working. i was so focused on trying to figure out what it was and every detail on it, that i did not even tell my husband till i could no longer see the object anymore. it was a jaw dropping experience but i remained totally calm, no fear at all and feel this helped me to remember it vividly. 

at first, i thought what an odd firecracker flying way to low down, it was literally only as high up as my  eavestrough on my 2nd story house, but i quickly realized this object was not fireworks of any type. 
this bright white-yellowish-orange flying sphere of light with what appeared to be a tail or trail coming out the back of the object (the tail through me off because in all the times i ever heard or read about these things no mention of a tail), the tail or trail coming from behind this object was not as uniform in shape as the sphere but appeared to be part of it (one continuous unit). there also appeared to be a swirling/marbling effect continuously changing within the object which appeared to be swirling in a light orange, yellow and white, as though it was chemicals or gasses not properly mixing.
it was completely silent and unusually slowly moving (coasting/floating) appearing to remain at the eavestrough height level, but remained below the height of the tallest evergreen tree it floated by (which my husband estimates is about 20ft up while standing on our deck or 25ft from the ground level), it proceeded through our backyard moving in a straight line heading in a se direction, then proceeding between the 2 houses behind our house towards the street directly behind our property .
size comparison to a known object for comparison purposes only, this object appeared to be the same size as a large pilates exercise ball, a moving ball of light, the object definitely illuminated the space which surrounded this object. 

one of my sons friends local to my area, also witnessed either the same or similar object right around the same time. she saw it stop flash and pulse several times then leave her sight. 

the picture i uploaded is not one i took, it is for comparison purposes only, it is one from the internet that is the only picture i could see that looked just like it as it floated away, although the colours are off.
content.summary: Bright floating sphere of light with a tail or trail seen at close range

content.detailedDescription: My friend took and send me that digital photo of the moon and we can c an object ,i and she would like to know what u think of it ,cuz in her area and also in mine lots of thing hapening in the sky.She notice after she took the photo. and she kept watching it after for a while . she went in after but ad trouble sleeping that night .
content.summary: My friend took a picture and this was on it beside the moon

content.detailedDescription:
Well it was late in the night i was alone out side and my brother was with his freind axross the street' im sure the derection of it was north of fresno ca . it had a bright white haze around it it was circle and moving slow but im sure it was moving way faster than that cuase it had dissapperd in a cluster of stars way out of our solar system the light went away . as i thoguht in my head to my self i said ""i see you"" cuase im not the ufo kinda guy . thats when it had left ... later that night i only told my brother cuase i did not want any one to think im crazzy . after i had prayed to it hoping some how it can read my thoughts.
when i was younger my dad and i seen a '6 million dallar man ' eppisode when a ufo crashes and these people like things can read minds andbut they want there ship crashes and they cant get back to were they are from ... im sure to some this might sound dumb . but im my self i seen what i had seen . 7/6/13 ... my feeling was weird and did not seem very real until it had left 
i first noticed it when i was looking at the stars just thinking . was not a plane a plane cannot leave our solar system and a rocket i know what those look like . i wish i had a pic of it if i had one every last soul would belive in some type of  smarter being out there then just us"
content.summary: White haze orb ' type abject only one it had flew into a clust of stars and gone it was

content.detailedDescription: 4th of july. 11 something pm. everybody is looking skyword at fireworks.  jim says what is that!  i turned and looked at a bright red light approaching from approx. 15 degrees from the north east.  i said it's a ufo!  i saw the same red light 2 years earlier twice in one night.  at the same time 2 years ago, a jet liner at about 32-35,000 ft. gave me a way to measure the approx. altitude!  i estimated that because the aparent speed resembled a jet liner, this vehical had to be traveling mach 5 at 100,000 ft.  i am so glad i had my camera with me.  now i try to keep it with me at all times, you never know?  you might see bigfoot!!!
content.summary: Bright red light from n/ne 15 deg, turns due west.  saw 2 years ago 2 times. same path. jet at approx  35.000. ufo at est, 80.000 - 120.000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 bright twinkling lights ascending above the tree tops in a straight line...They ascended seconds apart.   when they were all in the sky they formed a triangle...Constantly moving.  i called my husband to see them, at this time the one to the left moved to form a straight line once more.  he went to get a camera however they diappeared one at a time before we could get a picture. we're not sure if they went behind the clouds.  there was thunder and lighting as this was going on. at first i thought it was fireworks but the lights went too high for fireworks  this happened about 9:45pm on july 6, 2013.
content.summary: 3 white lights ascending above tree tops in straight line seconds apart..

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving north on i-71 near columbus, oh.  approx. 9:45 pm 7/6/13.  as we were 15-20 min. s of columbus, i noticed a bright light up in the sky to the south/southeast of the interstate.  it seemed like an airplane but it caught my eye because it was brighter than i would expect.  i pointed it out to my wife and children (age 7 & 4).  then the light lowered altitude and broke up into 2-3 lights.  then 2-3 other lights appeared.  sometimes a light (or lights) would go off, and others would appear.  it seemed there were 4-5 total but we usually could only see 3-4 at a time.  at this point, my wife got out her iphone and started video which is very inconclusive and hard to see - you can hear us describing what we are watching.  the lights then headed east / southeast and our view was obstructed by trees and the interstate was going in the opposite direction.  we were all 'shell shocked' since we really didn't know what we just saw or what happened.  not freaked out or scared or anything, just quiet and all just looked wide-eyed at each other and said 'that was really weird, what the heck was that'.  i want to believe these were helicopters heading toward rickenbacker airport.  that would be the most feasible answer to what we saw.  that said, being a witness to the altitude change, lights changing on and off, formation moving in and out etc., i just don't think it was helicopters.  after i got home and did online research, these look almost exactly like the videos i found online from phoenix, chicago, and many other places with lights in the sky ufos.  that's all i have.
content.summary: Unknown group of 4-5 lights sighted in sky.  moved, then flew away

content.detailedDescription: Just to let u know i reported something i saw around myrtle beach this winter,was unsure of sighting.This however was seen by me and 2 witnesses and it was airborne.Approximately 10 pm last nite myself and 2 others saw a hovering orange light which was visible to me for about 3 minutes.When i first saw this i thought it was a star,but upon closer observation i noticed it was moving,it was not an airplane or helicopter and it emitted no sound.I was standing in the street and saw it was over the water behind ocracoke island,the oyster creek neighborhood.2 friends saw me and stopped to ask what i was doing and i found out they too had seen it earlier and saw it while they were talking to me.They said it was really fast and had seen it earlier.I have not seen them since the sighting because i didnt ask them enough questions at the time,it was saturday nite.Anyhow the objest seemed to hover and move back and forth for a ways in a random pattern but on one of the turns i saw it was triangle shaped becuse the lighting on the bottom i guess was in that pattern,i dont think it changed shape or anything because you know its hard to make out details in the sky at nite but it was there right off my neighborhood anyhow i strongly suspect this may be the military because we have had sightings before especially about 10 years ago before the v22 osprey was operational and deployed overseas  i knew what i saw then was coming from cherry point but there were usually a half dozen or so of those and we were permantly kicked off while scanning using a hand held scanner but heard a distinctly human male voice before being bumped.That was then we know what that was this was seen by us and made us excited i guess and after about 3 minutes it dissapeared below the trees and we did not see it again.Our observation was about a hundred yards or so form the neighborhood and there were trees in the way as that allowed the object to retire from site,nothing fast just meandered away really.I would say this was about the size of a small car as i said i was walking from my neighborhood along the main road and saw what i thought was a star,i have mistakenly thought stars might be something upon sighting them,but if they dont move its your eyes playing tricks on you.However this seemed to move so i stopped in the middle of the road and looked closer and it did move,back and forth like it was looking for something.It had orange lights so it wasnt a star and while i was looking at it my friends stopped and saw it again  all i can say is it seemed triangular after i saw that pattern of lighting,the size of a small car maybe a little bigger its hard to judge hovering and meandering giving out no sound on a quiet nite but like im said the military has lots of bases around here so i thought i should let you know  i did not see any entities so i put robotic since this was a machine,you should work on that
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw hovering and meandering object with orange lights for 3 minutes emitting no sound over water by neighborhood of oyster creek,witnessed with 2 other persons about 10 pm

content.detailedDescription: One of my friends was on his bike on the highway and seen his strange light by a cloud. around the same time me and my brother seen these strange cloud in the sky two different places
content.summary: One of my friends was on his bike on the highway and seen his strange light by a cloud. around the same time me and my brother seen these strange cloud in the sky two different places

content.detailedDescription: One of my friends was on his bike on the highway and seen his strange light by a cloud. around the same time me and my brother seen these strange cloud in the sky two different places
content.summary: One of my friends was on his bike on the highway and seen his strange light by a cloud. around the same time me and my brother seen these strange cloud in the sky two different places

content.detailedDescription: On july 6, 2013 i was driving home from breakfast with my mother and brother in the car. my brother was driving, my mother was in the front passenger side, and i was behind my mother in the back seat. the days weather conditions were 90 degrees and clear blue california skys. we were driving down sierra college blvd. at 1:50 pm. we crossed brace road and were approching taylor road intersection when my brother asked openly what is that in the sky. i looked left and right and seen nothing, then i moved quickly to the center of the seats so i could get a better view out of the front windows. as we crossed over the taylor road intersection i noticed the direction my brother was looking and so i stared in that same direction (westish), but there was a batch of trees in the way. a couple seconds later the trees cleared the view and i was able to see what my brother was talking about out of the rear side window. at first glance it looked like a large white airplane with out a tail wing. it was also flying lower than a normal commercial plane should be (approx. 3k-5k above the earth and 20-25 degrees from horizon). i switched my view from the back rear driver window to the front window (approx. 1 second of broken view from the object). the object started to glow like a standard tube shaped fluorescent bulb. the time for the object to change from what looked like standard white auto paint to a glowing fluorescent tube was about 3 seconds. after the object started to glow a transparent undefined semi-circle cloud/mist formed around the object vertically (approx. 1-2 miles wide). it seemed like the cloud formed instantly out of no where. within the center of the cloud was the object. directly around the cigar shaped object was what looked like heat waves shimmering above and blow the object. as soon as the cloud formed you could see the object within/behind the cloud starting to glow even brighter. the object quickly started to glow very bright. so bright that i had to stop looking at it directly and looked about 5 degrees up to the right of it (the edge of the newly formed cloud). about a second after i looked to the edge of the cloud it vanished. i immediately looked back to the spot in the sky where the object had been stationary at. nothing! not even the cloudy formation was present. just open blue skys as far as the eye could see. i quickly panned all around the sky where it was. there was nothing in the sky, nothing. the closes air force base is beale a.F.B. at about 15 miles from where we viewed it at. we all have seen many different military air craft living so close to a a.F.B. this was unlike anything ive ever seen before. after 40 years of life, i can say now that i have seen something new and different. my feeling at the time of the incident was wow, awe, and confusing. ive seen many natural anomalies in my years but nothing like this.  this seemed intentional. intelligent.
content.summary: Noticed a white plane object without a tail wing sitting in the sky about 10-15 miles away and 20-25 degrees from horizon. a cloudy mist formed around it vertically and it started to glow, then got brighter and vanished before my eyes.

content.detailedDescription:
This evening my husband and i were taking a bike ride through our neighborhood when i spotted an orange-red circular light in the eastern sky.  at first i assumed the light was part of the fireworks that had been taking place off and on throughout our ride, but just a minute or so later, we rounded a curve to find the light was directly in front of us just below a low cloud cover.  the strangeness of what we saw stopped us both in our tracks, literally.  the color and circular pattern of the lights were obviously different than any air craft we typically see.

at first the object appeared to be stationary and at an altitude of about 3000  5000 feet.  there was absolutely no sound coming from the object whatsoever throughout our observation.  as we continued to observe, the craft made its way toward us in a westward direction at what appeared to be a steady altitude.  the speed appeared to be about that of single engine plane.  

as it passed directly overhead it was obvious that the object was illuminated unlike any airplane weve ever observed.  the lights appeared to be arranged in a circular pattern, were pulsating rather than blinking, and were predominantly red and either yellow or orange.  what we observed definitely was not typical of airplane running lights.  we were unable to make out a shape other than the circular appearance of the lights, and there was no unusual motion  just a steady westward track.  we were able to observe the object for about five minutes before it slowly went out of sight.  we estimate that the craft would have flown just south of the bowling green airport as it headed westward.

my husband and i both are reasonably intelligent, college-educated persons with what i would consider an average curiosity in possibility of extra-terrestrial life.  i am 52 and my husband is 60, neither of us were drinking or under the influence of any substances.  we have a pool at our current residence and have spent many evenings observing the night sky, including the typical air traffic and the occasional satellite.  

in summary, what we saw was unusual enough that we both felt it important to report our observations.  the complete lack of sound at such a low altitude and the color and circular arrangement of the lights were unlike anything either of us had ever seen before.  my husband was particularly intrigued with the complete lack of sound.
content.summary: Spotted silent craft with pulsing circular lights (predominantly red with some yellow and orange tones) heading west at a low altitude at about 9:45pm.

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching tv when we saw though the window some lights blinking. we at first thought it was firecracker in the sky. but there was no noise and it did not stop blinking. we noticed it had a shape of a big dark cloud, that was blinking light as if it was formed by blinking stars. the blinking was random inside the cloud and the cloud was moving steadily. it went all the way from se to s at the same height and as soon as we bearely saw the first cloud-object, we noticed the second one, coming from the same direction and doing the same thing. we took some pictures in the cell phone and videos with the tablet, but nothing can be seen. the second cloud-object did the same thing as the first, and as in the first, as soon as we could see the second going away, we noticed a third one coming from the same direction.
this time we got a green laser and pointed to it, and as soon as the laser bean was on the cloud-object (that had random lights blinking), the random lights stopped blinking, although we could still see a dark cloud-object, there was no more blinking.

the best way to describe the object is if you imagine a big dark cloud with blinking random stars on it.
content.summary: 3 blinking cloud-style objects above city

content.detailedDescription:
My mother was outside, we were getting ready to go to the store.  i was inside and she suddenly rushed in and frantically told me to come outside. i did, and we both witnessed first 1 red/orange orb slowly ascending from west to north west.  it wasn't burning just a solid glowing light.  i thought at first it could have been some type of firework.  however, the object was moving too slow, it was not burning, there was no smoke or trail of any type, and no sound.  then a few minutes later from the same direction another one appeared, same description.  i was really starting to wonder what was going on then.  i'd never seen anything quite like it.  also take into mind that i watch the sky very often and have seen lots of things( some strange) but never like this.  then a couple of minutes later i saw another one, same path as the others.  shortly after that another appeared.  i waited to see if i could see any more of them, but nothing else appeared, except an airplane in a completely different spot when the orbs were not visible anymore.
    i have seen other strange things in the sky before, but nothing quite like this.  i do believe there are some strange things out there unexplained.  any information on this would be much appreciated.  we do live around a well populated area so i'm sure we weren't the only ones to witness this.
content.summary: They were glowing red/orange orbs slowly ascending, no bilking lights, wasn't on fire no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling with my fiance down westfield road when we spotted a police officer make a sharp turn and park down a street. seemed normal till we saw him observing a bunch of glowing red orbs in the sky. at first we thought it could have been a flyover for the last day of fireworks but as time went on this scenario seemed less likely to be. they were all traveling in close proximety to one another. there must have been over 15 of them. the red lights were flashing sequentially bright then dull bright then dull. the objects didnt flutter or change direction suddenly. they didnt dissappear either. they were over 500 above in the sky and moving fast for the distance they appeared away. at the time there were helicopters in the air, not close to them or viewing them, but you can tell the difference. if your from the area you know its wide open fields and theres always at least 3 helicopters in the sky. there were also planes flying above to. im curious as to what the cop saw or why there were over 5 other cars pulled to the side of the road but i cant seem to find answers or other peoples sightings.
content.summary: Over 15 bright orbs spotted traveling together in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the back porch with neighbors when high in the sky, not around the horizon, there appeared what looked like a fireball with a tail that became increasing brighter falling. it then broke into three parts. after about 1 to 2 seconds 4 to 5 lights appeared. the lights flashed on and off and a few moved back and forth form left to right. the lights then disappeared. the event lasted form beginning to end about 5 to 7 minutes. my neighbor video taped the lights moving and flashing, but did not get the initial fireball.
content.summary: Observed fireball, then broke into smaller ones which flashed
